# 面向所有人的机器学习科普大全

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mianxiang-suoyouren-de-jiqi-xuexi-kepu-daquan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mianxiang-suoyouren-de-jiqi-xuexi-kepu-daquan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mianxiang-suoyouren-de-jiqi-xuexi-kepu-daquan
mianxiang-suoyouren-de-jiqi-xuexi-kepu-daquan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mianxiang-suoyouren-de-jiqi-xuexi-kepu-daquan
mianxiang-suoyouren-de-jiqi-xuexi-kepu-daquan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
